official_title: A joint resolution to congratulate the skipper and crew of the STARS & STRIPES on their victory in the 1987 America's Cup yachting competition.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to congratulate Dennis Conner and the crew of the yacht Stars and Stripes on their 1987 America's Cup victory.
